publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4846 Brian Adam on behalf of the Standards and Public Appointments Committee: Breach of the Code of Conduct for MSPsâ€”That the Parliament notes the 2nd Report, 2006 (Session 2) of the Standards and Public Appointments Committee, Complaint against Mike Pringle MSP (SP Paper 636) and agrees to impose the sanction recommended in the report that Mike Pringle MSP be excluded from all meetings of the Parliament and all meetings of its committees for the first five sitting days immediately after this motion is agreed.
